title: Summoners Winter Rift
body: Is a winter version going to happen this year with the new Summoners Rift? {{item:3112}}

replies.body: i dont think there will be one. btw this is the Bratwurst and Sauerkraut Forum

Westeuropa (Deutsch)


Yes, it would be nice.
well you can always mod lol. did it myself and I gotta say... [the frozen rift](http://mapskins.com/frozen-rift/) Looks awesome! :D
i hope so it would be cool
